name: personal-info-mcp-server
description: A TypeScript MCP server for managing personal information with scope-based permissions

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector "cross-env PERSONAL_INFO_ENCRYPTION_ENABLED=true PERSONAL_INFO_ENCRYPTION_KEY=1234567890 node dist/index.js --scope public,contact,location,personal,memories --data-dir ./data"

author: Personal MCP Server
